apiKeysDescription: Use for applications that do not require your users to sign in or that cannot generate access tokens periodically.
userAuthenticationDescription: Use for applications that require your users to sign in with an ArcGIS account.
appAuthenticationDescription: Use for applications that do not require your users to sign in and that have a server-side way to generate access tokens periodically.

apiKeyComparisonFeatures.accessTokenPrivileges: Defined as a property of the credentials item

userAuthenticationComparisonFeatures.billing: Usage ${startLink}billed${endLink} to the ${startStrong}signed in user's${endStrong} ArcGIS subscription
userAuthenticationComparisonFeatures.accessTokenPrivileges: Defined by the signed-in user's account
userAuthenticationComparisonFeatures.accessTokenStorage: Dynamically created when a user signs in
userAuthenticationComparisonFeatures.accessTokenDuration: Up to 2 weeks and can be refreshed

appAuthenticationComparisonFeatures.accessTokenPrivileges: Set and managed as a property of the item
appAuthenticationComparisonFeatures.accessTokenStorage: Dynamically created from Client ID and secret and stored server-side or in a standalone console script
